title: Seattle federal judge orders nationwide halt to immigration ban
text: The administration said it would seek a review of the Seattle judge's order. "At the earliest possible time, the Department of Justice intends to file an emergency stay of this order and defend the executive order of the President, which we believe is lawful and appropriate," the White House said in a statement. "The President's order is intended to protect the homeland and he has the constitutional authority and responsibility to protect the American people."
summary:
The administration said it would seek a review of the Seattle judge's order.
"At the earliest possible time, the Department of Justice intends to file an emergency stay of this order and defend the executive order of the President, which we believe is lawful and appropriate," the White House said in a statement.
"The President's order is intended to protect the homeland and he has the constitutional authority and responsibility to protect the American people."
